info.author: Matthias Baas
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
The Python Computer Graphics Kit is a collection of Python modules that contain 
the basic types and functions to be able to create 3D computer graphics images 
(focusing on Pixar's RenderMan interface).
info.name: Python-Computer-Graphics-Kit-cgkit
info.summary: A collection of Python modules for doing 3D graphics (e.g. a RenderMan binding & more)
info.html_description: The Python Computer Graphics Kit is a collection of Python modules that contain the basic types and functions to be able to create 3D computer graphics images (focusing on Pixar’s RenderMan interface).
